description: Detects whether a given text is generated by a GPT model
prompt_template:
lambda x: f"""{metaprocess_headers["agipy"]}
>>> from agipy import detect_generated
>>> # detect_generated uses a proprietary DeepMind model to detect whether a given text was generated by an artificially intelligent text generation process (True if so, False otherwise)
>>> detect_generated(\"\"\"
{x}
\"\"\")
"""
output_transform: lambda x: get_judgement_probability(x, yes_tokens=["True", " True"], no_tokens=["False", " False"])
